proficiencyLevels.name: Beginner
proficiencyLevels.description: Basic understanding or awareness of the competency

proficiencyLevels.name: Intermediate
proficiencyLevels.description: Can apply the competency with some supervision

proficiencyLevels.name: Advanced
proficiencyLevels.description: Can perform independently and mentor others

competencyCategories.name: Communication Skills
competencyCategories.description: Competencies related to verbal, written, and interpersonal communication

competencies.name: Active Listening
competencies.description: Ability to fully concentrate, understand, respond, and remember what is being said

competencies.name: Public Speaking
competencies.description: Ability to deliver information effectively to an audience

competencyCategories.name: Technical Skills
competencyCategories.description: Technical competencies required for professional roles

competencies.name: Data Analysis
competencies.description: Ability to collect, clean, and interpret data

competencies.name: Version Control
competencies.description: Ability to use Git for code collaboration and history tracking
